entry.title: Friday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
